#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Beat Cabin Fever
#Text=Wintertime can be a big drain on anyone ’s mood .
#Text=Cold weather , lack of sun , and general boredom can bring on the seasonal blues .
#Text=But it does n’t have to be this way !
#Text=You can banish cabin fever by getting creative , making some changes to your environment , and consuming the right stuff .
#Text=Fill your winter with family and fun .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Getting Creative
#Text=Get physical inside .
#Text=When it 's just too cold to go outdoors , make the inside of your house into a playground !
#Text=Use couch cushions to make a “ wrestle room ; ”
#Text=outline an obstacle course using chairs , tables , and other household items ; or use foam basketballs or footballs to simulate sports games inside .
#Text=Getting your body moving is lots of fun and never fails to perk up your mood .
#Text=Make a family craft .
#Text=Try a new craft such as creating a family scrapbook .
#Text=Get everybody involved by picking out favorite family pictures .
#Text=Create a special category page for each one .
#Text=Write your favorite stories or memories , and then add some colorful stamps or stickers .
#Text=Start a recipe box or book .
#Text=Pick out favorite recipes from magazines , newspapers or books , Write down family favorites .
#Text=Type them onto cards or cut them out and paste them into a scrapbook .
#Text=Let other members of the households pick out some of their favorites and take a day to create the recipes .
#Text=Create a warm and delicious smelling kitchen on a cold windy day .
#Text=Put on a family game night .
#Text=Gather some of your favorite board games , play charades or even your own version of win , lose or draw .
#Text=Plant candy or trinkets around the house as prizes .
#Text=Create a few teams and play games .
#Text=Serve everybody 's favorite snack and beverage .
#Text=Have a dance party .
#Text=When all else fails , simply put on some funky tunes and shake it off .
#Text=Dance those cabin fever blues away .
#Text=You can even put together a “ Banishing Cabin Fever ” playlist with all your favorite songs to dance to , and save it for a gloomy , snowy day .
#Text=Changing Your Environment
#Text=Go outside .
#Text=Challenge cabin fever ’s hold on you , by facing the elements head on !
#Text=Bundle up and head out into the cold .
#Text=A little sunshine , some fresh air , and a change of perspective are exceptionally powerful at chasing cabin fever away .
#Text=Go for a walk , make a snow angel , or just step outside for five minutes .
#Text=It can do wonders for your winter mood .
#Text=Move your bed .
#Text=You can maximize your absorption of depression-fighting Vitamin D and keep cabin fever at bay by simply relocating your bed !
#Text=Move your bed under a window that gets some light during the early morning .
#Text=This little boost of sunlight can shine some positivity into your whole day .
#Text=Invest in house plants .
#Text=When everything outside is dead and gray ( contributing to depression and cabin fever ) , bring some life and color into your home .
#Text=Invest a few houseplants .
#Text=Select varieties that are easy to care for and do n’t require a great deal of light .
#Text=Keeping a few green , living beings in your house can invigorate your mood and even give you a tiny oxygen boost .
#Text=Seal up drafts .
#Text=You ’ll have a hard time banishing cabin fever if you ’ve got the chills .
#Text=Seal up any drafts in your house or apartment to stay cozy and warm .
#Text=Place rolled up towels or store-bough “ draft stoppers ” at the bases of your windows or at the bottom of doors .
#Text=Clean your house .
#Text=Invite a springtime feeling into your home by doing some early spring-cleaning .
#Text=A cluttered apartment is a recipe for cabin fever blues , so get your blood pumping , and boost your mood by taking the time to clean , organize , and reduce clutter .
#Text=Clean your cabin fever funk right out of your house !
#Text=Consuming the Right Stuff
#Text=Eat warm foods .
#Text=Staying warm and cozy means burning more calories .
#Text=You can stay happy and healthy during the winter by eating hearty stews and warm chilis .
#Text=If your belly is nice and full of good warm stuff , you are less likely to be affected by cabin fever .
#Text=Get some vitamin D.
#Text=The number one cause of seasonal depression is lack of sunlight ( or vitamin D ) .
#Text=Add some vitamin D to your diet by eating fish , mushroom , fortified milk , or taking supplements .
#Text=Also , look for the sun anywhere you can !
#Text=Sit in front of a window or bundle up and head out onto your porch for a few minutes .
#Text=If you live in a region with very little natural sunlight , consider investing in a sunlamp .
#Text=Eat healthy sugar .
#Text=Lack of sunlight can cause us to crave high-sugar foods .
#Text=Give yourself a sweet sugar boost in a healthy way to help keep cabin fever away .
#Text=Try dark chocolate covered cherries , dried mangoes , or carrots roasted with a little honey to satisfy your sugar cravings and boost your mood .
#Text=Avoid binging on TV or movies .
#Text=Watching a movie or a few episodes of a TV show can be a great way to pass the time indoors .
#Text=But spending the whole day ( or night ) binge watching , is likely to contribute to feelings of listlessness and depression , inviting cabin fever in to stay .
#Text=Limit yourself to an hour or two of TV time each day , or less .
#Text=Avoid binging on food .
#Text=When there is nothing much to do , people have a tendency to stuff themselves full of high-carb , high-calorie foods .
#Text=While snacking can be fun and uplifting , overdoing it will make you feel heavy , and put you in a bad mood .
#Text=Exercise some portion control when snacking .
#Text=Endlessly eating in front of the TV actually encourages feelings of cabin fever .
#Text=Engage your mind .
#Text=Doing anything that stimulates your cognitive capacities is wonderful for banishing cabin fever .
#Text=Try doing a crossword puzzle , Sudoku , or just reading a book .
#Text=If you can do this activity while sitting in front of a window , even better !
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you 're involved in the creative arts , you can use this time to work on any projects you have .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Movies
#Text=Sleeping bags
#Text=Games
#Text=Favorite books
#Text=Small prizes
#Text=Scrapbook tools and accessories
#Text=Favorite family portraits
#Text=Recipes
#Text=Cards
#Text=Plants
#Text=Warm clothes
#Text=Towels or draft stoppers
#Text=Yummy warm food
